mapper.select: SELECT ti.item_seq AS ITEM_SEQ,ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_UNIT, ITEM_DESCRIPTION,ST_CNT,ws.work_seq AS WORK_SEQ,WORK_NAME FROM nkep_11.TB_ITEM ti , nkep_11.TB_STOCK ts,nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE ws WHERE ti.item_seq = ts.item_seq and ts.work_seq = ws.work_seq
SELECT ITEM_IMG AS IMG FROM nkep_11.TB_ITEM WHERE ITEM_SEQ=#{itemSeq}
SELECT ITEM_IMG2 AS IMG FROM nkep_11.TB_ITEM WHERE ITEM_SEQ=#{itemSeq}
SELECT ITEM_IMG3 AS IMG FROM nkep_11.TB_ITEM WHERE ITEM_SEQ=#{itemSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE nkep_11.TB_ITEM item, nkep_11.TB_STOCK stock, nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE ws SET item.ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}, stock.ST_CNT = #{stCnt}, item.ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType}, item.ITEM_PRICE = #{itemPrice}, item.ITEM_DESCRIPTION =#{itemDescription}, item.ITEM_IMG = NULL, item.ITEM_IMG2= NULL, item.ITEM_IMG3 = NULL WHERE item.ITEM_SEQ = stock.ITEM_SEQ and stock.WORK_SEQ = ws.WORK_SEQ and item.ITEM_SEQ = #{itemSeq} and ws.WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq}
